headline.main: PRESIDENT GRANTS LEAVE TO BIGGERS; Lease-Lend Official Will Return to Toledo Glass Company to Help Meet Problems

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 30 -- President Roosevelt granted a leave of absence from government service today to John D. Biggers, Special Minister to London and Lease-Lend Expediter.
snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 30 -- President Roosevelt granted a leave of absence from government service today to John D. Biggers, Special Minister to London and Lease-Lend Expediter....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
